New Records: LeBron James became the only player in NBA history to play in 22 seasons
LeBron James and Bronny James became the first father and son to play in the NBA together at the same time
Key Match Events: Anthony Davis had 36 points and 16 rebounds
Anthony Edwards scored 27 points for the Timberwolves
Pre-Game Insights: LeBron James and Bronny James became the first father and son to play in the NBA together
The Lakers largely unchanged roster showed the benefits of continuity
The Timberwolves will face growing pains in the post-Towns era
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win
The coach highlighted the victory as a crucial step toward the championship
Miscellaneous Highlights: Minnesota Timberwolves guard Anthony Edwards scored 27 points
Julius Randle had 16 points and nine rebounds
Donte DiVincenzo had 10 points in their Timberwolves debuts
